# TC02 - 2 adults + 1 child (11 years old)

## Step 02: block (getrooms_block)

### API Request
**Endpoint:** `POST /api/flows/block`  
**Headers:**  
- `Authorization: Bearer ***`

```json
{"flowId":"cef17245-74d6-4169-a621-a935bdfd8e0f","offerToken":".OTjiyr8RO9JjuwFQNdqN3wAAgaLlxJSWHu-3wK26BKY"}
```
